Subject: Unwanted alerts
Description:
In conducting the UAT our users are experiecing unwanted alerts when plugging in devices.

the aim is to get alerts if they are doing something wrong - like trying to upload a file to USB but EPP policy is blocking it.

We would like to customise these alerts.

could it be possible you can give us some guidance.
Solution_Comment__c:
Advised the customer how they can configure custom notifications both for DC and CAP modules.
Also addressed other questions they had on other topics outside of this ticket's description.
